snippet: Meryl Meisler wasn’t interested in capturing the urban decay of Bushwick, Brooklyn, in the 1980s so much as she was the signs of normal life happening despite it.
abstract: Photographer Meryl Meisler captured images of crumbling 1980s Bushwick, Brooklyn, where she taught school at the time; her book A Tale of Two Cities: Disco Era Bushwick, from Bizarre Publishing, juxtaposes her photos from the city’s discos with those from the neighborhood.
lead_paragraph: Meryl Meisler wasn’t interested in capturing the urban decay of Bushwick, Brooklyn, in the 1980s so much as she was the signs of normal life happening despite it.
